body: I haven't been around much even though I want to.  It was 1 week probation or demtion. I took demtion and the retired rank. It was truly fun meeting so many new people. And have a lot of fun as staff. But my time has come. This is not a goodbye. This is just my step down I will still be around playing and what not. I might not be on Teamspeak as much though. ;)
body_tagged: I haven't been around much even though I want to.  It was 1 week probation or demtion. I took demtion and the retired rank. It was truly fun meeting so many new people.
